attributes.action: Ban the sale and use of alcohol and cigarettes in the UK, under the misuse of drugs act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Last year 2500 people died from using illegal drugs. Most of these from drugs such as Heroin and Cocaine.
Last year, approximatly 16000 people died from alcohol poisoning. This one substance alone killed more people in one year than all illegal drugs have killed in the last 5 years.
The government's policy is that the public should be protected from the harm of these substances, so we ask that the government protect us once more and ban alcohol, for the public good.
